title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin on Biz Growth, Gambling Pivot
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin on Biz Growth, Gambling Pivot
description:
Fanatics CEO Michael Rubin joins Colin to discuss his strategy to take the world’s leading licensed sports merchandiser into gambling and NFT’s, why he got out of his ownership stakes in the Sixers, why he hasn’t sold the company, what sells in Europe that doesn’t work in the U.S., if he’s ever regretted selling a company, why he doesn’t want “yes” men around, and how he stays on the front end of cultural trends as he gets older.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd   

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
